content.body: We apply Design Thinking techniques to frame problems and ask the right questions. We then produce ideas we can test, choose, implement and learn from.

sections.content:
An end-to-end approach to User Experience Design: we work with you during the discovery phase, helping you define your service, and during the execution phases to ensure the delivery of delightful, engaging experiences.

Our approach puts your organisation's goals and your users needs at the centre of our process. Our User Experience services are built around:

  1. Setting a vision and plan for your organisation through Strategy & Planning
  2. Understanding the needs and behaviours of your users through User Research & Validation
  3. Designing your service or product iteratively through Concept Work & Design

Strategy & Planning: Setting a vision and plan for your Organisation

Our UX team brings their creative thinking and user-centred design skills to help your organisation achieve your objectives while providing value to your users in a meaningful way.

As a result, our strategy offering benefits from a multidisciplinary team that provides you with a practical, realistic and measurable plan of action.

Tools and techniques we can use during Strategy & Planning:

  • Stakeholders Interviews
  • Competitive Analysis
  • Personas and Scenarios
  • Strategy and Planning Workshops
  • Customer Journey Mapping
  • Metrics Analysis and Key Performance Indicators
  • Content Audits and Content Strategy
  • Expert Reviews / Heuristics Evaluations
